item.title: HEIGHT INCREASE LINE
item.content: <p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Our team is qualified in the production of shoes with height increase. By studying the design particularly, we are able to produce models of shoes with +7 and +10 centimeter of increase. The footwear seems to be normal externally. At the same time, thanks to the insertion of internal wedge, it enables the man to be taller in a comfortable way, stretching the body and supporting the posture and back in an invisible way.</p>
item.author: admin
